amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Energy to establish an Energy Efficiency Loan Program under which the Secretary shall make funds available to States to support financial assistance provided by qualified financing entities for making qualified energy efficiency or renewable efficiency improvements.

action.text: Amendment SA 440 proposed by Senator Merkley. (consideration: CR S3660-3661; text: CR S3660-3661) To require the Secretary of Energy to establish an Energy Efficiency Loan Program under which the Secretary shall make funds available to States to support financial assistance provided by qualified financing entities for making qualified energy efficiency or renewable efficiency improvements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 440 proposed by Senator Merkley.
